edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster.hierarchical
Class HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>

java.lang.Object
  com.davidsoergel.trees.BasicPhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>
      edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster.hierarchical.HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.davidsoergel.dsutils.Labellable<String>, com.davidsoergel.trees.HierarchyNode<CentroidCluster<T>,com.davidsoergel.trees.PhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>>, com.davidsoergel.trees.LengthWeightHierarchyNode<CentroidCluster<T>,com.davidsoergel.trees.PhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>>, com.davidsoergel.trees.PhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>, com.davidsoergel.trees.SerializablePhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>, BatchCluster<T,HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T>>, CentroidCluster<T>, Cluster<T>, Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T>>, Iterable<com.davidsoergel.trees.PhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HierarchicalExplicitCentroidCluster
public class HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>
extends com.davidsoergel.trees.BasicPhylogenyNode<CentroidCluster<T>>
implements CentroidCluster<T>, BatchCluster<T,HierarchicalCentroidCluster<T>>

A tree node representing a hierarchical cluster. Fakes multiple inheritance by providing a facade to the contained Cluster. I.e., this is mostly a PhylogenyNode containing a CentroidCluster value, but it can also act like a CentroidCluster directly.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Soergel
See Also:
Serialized Form

addToSumOfSquareDistances

public void addToSumOfSquareDistances(double v)
Increments the sum of square distances. Note there can be no online method of updating the sum of squares, because the centroid keeps moving

Specified by:

getStdDev

public double getStdDev()
Returns the standard deviation of the distances from each sample to the centroid, if this has already been computed. Can be used as a (crude?) measure of clusteredness, in combination with the distances between the cluster centroids themselves. May return an obsolete value if the cluster centroid or members have been altered since the standard deviation was computed.

Specified by:
getStdDev in interface CentroidCluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>
Returns:
the standard deviation of the distances from each sample to the centroid

setSumOfSquareDistances

public void setSumOfSquareDistances(double i)
Sets the sum of squared distances from the samples in this cluster to its centroid. Computed externally in ClusteringMethod.computeClusterStdDevs.

Specified by:
setSumOfSquareDistances in interface CentroidCluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>

i - the sumOfSquareDistances

getDerivedLabelProbabilities

public com.davidsoergel.dsutils.collections.WeightedSet<String> getDerivedLabelProbabilities()
Recomputes the probabilities of labels, based on the actual labels observed in the contained samples. This must be called explicitly to avoid unnecessary recomputation on every sample addition.

Specified by:
getDerivedLabelProbabilities in interface Cluster<T extends Clusterable<T>>
